title: Make yourself at home! Beautiful Studio in Bloomington
posting_body: ['Welcome home to The Covington Apartments!', 'Located at:', '5800 American Blvd W', 'Bloomington, MN 55437', 'Rental Information:', '# of Bedrooms: Studio', '# of Bathrooms:  1', 'Square Footage: 536 sq ft', 'Rental Pricing: $1475 - $1505/month', 'Contact our leasing office at', 'show contact info', 'Amazing.', 'Great staff.', 'The best.', 'A great place to call home.', "These words aren't ours-", "they're just some of the incredible reviews that you'll find describing The Covington Apartment Homes in Bloomington, Minnesota.", 'We work hard to make The Covington a great place to live, and we would love to welcome you into our friendly apartment community.', 'At The Covington, we offer studio, one and two bedroom apartments that are bright, open, and modern.', 'Each of our units has grand nine-foot ceilings, beautiful plank flooring, private balconies, and oversized windows that capture the surrounding views.', "You're sure to enjoy the community amenities that make our property stand out from the crowd.", 'Our rooftop patio has a convenient grilling station and a luxurious pool where you can relax and unwind.', 'Reserve and enjoy our theater room or bocce court for a memorable Friday night with friends, or work out in our first-rate fitness center to stay in shape.', 'Community Features:', '✓ Bike Storage', '✓ Business Center', '✓ Conference Room', '✓ Disposal Chutes', '✓ Elevator', '✓ Fire Pits', '✓ Guest Apartment', '✓ Pond', '✓ Recycling', '✓ Rooftop Lounge', '✓ 24-Hour Fitness Center', '✓ Barbecue/Grill Area', '✓ Fitness Programs/Classes', '✓ Kingsley Excellence Award', '✓ Maintenance on Site', '✓ Massages Offered', '✓ Package Deliver to Apartment', '✓ Planned Social Activities', '✓ Wake Up With Weidner Continental Breakfast', '✓ Welcoming Lobby Areas', 'Unit Features:', '✓ 9 Foot Ceilings', '✓ Air Conditioning', '✓ Garbage Disposal', '✓ Kitchen Island', '✓ Maple Cabinetry', '✓ Microwave', '✓ Oversized Windows', '✓ Sliding Glass Doors', '✓ Sprinkler System', '✓ Stainless Steel Energy Efficient Appliances', 'Office Hours:', 'Mon - Thu: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Fri - Sat: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'show contact info', 'Pet Policy:', 'Pet Friendly - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $300.00, Rent $40.00, Deposit $200.00, Breed Restrictions Apply.', 'Leasing Options:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Management:', 'Weidner Apartment Homes, LLC', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'A56CC6D3E8D240']
